page.title: 07Durrington Carnival 1985.
page.content: One of the{local events}of the year in Durrington was the Carnival.It was held on the 6th of July and most of the village folk attended. A funfair was there and also a lot of stallholders each representing an organization within the village. The{Carnival}started with a procession.The float that won this year was the 1st Durrington Guides with Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Second was the 2nd Durrington Brownies who were commemorating 75 years of guiding.A plaque was awarded to the winner and a cheque for Â£15. The Carnival{Queen}was Alison Baker. During the day people arrived to perform like The Comprehensive School Band,Majorettes from Amesbury and the Durrington Corps Of Drums.The day ended with a game of Its A Knockout.
